Game Genre / Type: Adventure & Fantasy
Theme: Bright/Dark Colorful and Dark graphics -- luimnated setting 

Win condition(s): Reach the final boss 
Loss condition(s): Lose all your lives

Levels / Screens: 
    -- Volcano 
    -- Town 

    Objectives / Enemies / Obstacles
    -- Various Enemies (Skull Enemies, dragons, warriors)

    Items / Equipment / Objects 
    -- Power-Ups (Magic)
    -- (?)

Difficulty Changes:
    -- Lower player's health
    -- Increase Enemies health
    -- Decrease amount of Power-Ups available

Controls: 
    -- Mouse RIGHT-ARROW -- MOVE FORWARD 
    -- MOUSE LEFT-ARROW -- MOVE BACKWARD 
    -- MOUSE A KEY, Press -- Magic 
    -- MOUSE D KEY, Press -- ATTACK
    -- MOUSE F KEY, Press -- JUMP
